MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: - Universal Binary - Growl support improved (and now required) - Added option to minimize AHP and iTunes while running - Added option to quit AHP and iTunes when exiting - Added ability to refresh iTunes playlists and Audio Hijack Pro sessions after making adding or removing items from those lists.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: Mac OS X 10.4.4 or greater Apple iTunes 5.0 or greater Registered copy of Rogue Amoeba's Audio Hijack Pro 2.5 or greater Growl 0.7 or greater

English.Keywords: hijack, itunes, audio, multimedia, automation, applescript, convert, audible, audibleready, aa, mp3, mpeg, aac, aiff, drm, filter, split, universal binary, mac, intel, pcc, playlist, effects
English.Char_Desc_45: Automate the conversion of iTunes playlists.
English.Char_Desc_80: Automates the conversion of audio in iTunes playlists using Audio Hijack Pro.
English.Char_Desc_250: This tools allows you to setup an Audio Hijack Pro template that not only can be used to convert media, but can also be used to apply sound effects/filters to the music, break the audio files up into conforming sizes for long files, etc.
English.Char_Desc_450: This tools allows you to setup an Audio Hijack Pro template that not only can be used to convert media, but can also be used to apply sound effects/filters to the music, break the audio files up into conforming sizes (every 30 minutes or something) for long files, etc. When you launch the tool and select a playlist each track in that playlist will be captured using the Audio Hijack Pro template you have setup and saved in the defined location.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Using Audio Hijack Pro on it's own you can not easily convert, apply filters, etc. to multiple tracks from iTunes in an automated fashion. This tools allows you to setup an Audio Hijack Pro template that not only can be used to convert media, but can also be used to apply sound effects/filters to the music, break the audio files up into conforming sizes (every 30 minutes or something) for long files, etc. When you launch the tool and select a playlist each track in that playlist will be captured using the Audio Hijack Pro template you have setup. Each track will be named properly and saved in the location defined in the template. There are quite a few formats supported by iTunes that many digital players don't support and some that are simply non-standard and/or proprietary. This makes converting those formats to standard, non-proprietary formats simple and automatic. Before registration Hijack iT! will only record the first 30 seconds of each track.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: Vendros and distributors are allowed to distribute and list this software product (without any registraion key) as described in this PAD file on their web site as long as it is referenced in a positive or neutral light by the owner of the site (excluding legitimate user reviews).
